snippet: Mr. Higham, whose books drew vast attention for their memorably vast claims, wrote a number of biographies on some of Hollywood’s biggest stars.
abstract: Charles Higham, prolific celebrity biographer, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Higham, whose books drew vast attention for their memorably vast claims, wrote a number of biographies on some of Hollywood’s biggest stars.

headline.seo: Charles Higham, Celebrity Biographer, Dies at 81
headline.main: Charles Higham, Celebrity Biographer, Dies at 81
headline.print_headline: Charles Higham, Celebrity Biographer, Is Dead at 81
